character.title: Pipis
character.name: PIPIS
character.description:
1. Incapable of speech.
2. Incapable of communication.
3. "The Original" 
4. An invasive species of freshwater clam.
5. Harmless.
6. Explodes.
7. Spamton affinity.
8. Cat/glitch type. Inherent Cat affinity and glitch affinity bonus.
9. Tastes like fresh.
10. Remember the boys in blue.
11. Pipis.
